name: Realm Swing
description: ±The main character has to make his way through the 3 realms, Earth, Hell, and Heaven. The objective is to get to the world end rock at the end of each realm. You will face Demons and Archangels. The object that let’s you swing is the key to end the Archangels from corrupting Heaven. After completing the realms you will face the monster boss which you need to defeat in order to reach the world end rock in Heaven and fix the world order.
